items.content_html: An experimental and lightweight email service project exploring the underlying infrastructure of email delivery, inspired by Gmail.
items.title: abubalo/maillo: An experimental and lightweight email service project exploring the underlying infrastructure of email delivery, inspired by Gmail.

items.content_html: A simple To-Do app built with vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Users can add, edit, and delete tasks, with all tasks saved in the browser's local storage for persistence across sessions. This app offers a lightweight way to manage daily tasks and serves as an introduction to core JavaScript and local storage concepts.
items.title: JayP2493/AlgoCamp_TodoList_VanilaJS: A simple To-Do app built with vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Users can add, edit, and delete tasks, with all tasks saved in the browser's local storage for persistence across sessions. This app offers a lightweight way to manage daily tasks and serves as an introduction to core JavaScript and local storage concepts.

items.content_html: Join is a lightweight and flexible Kanban board application designed to help teams and individuals manage tasks and projects efficiently. Inspired by Trello, Join enables you to create boards, lists, and cards to organize your workflow seamlessly.
